about_the_game:
Dive into the Bottomless Pitfall! This fast-paced, action-packed arcade adventure challenges you to survive as you plummet endlessly through a treacherous pit.

Dodge towering pillars as you plunge endlessly into the unknown. How long can you last before the pit gets the best of you?

Precision and quick reflexes are your keys to navigating this infinite descent.

Simple Gameplay, Endless Fun

Whether you’re a casual gamer looking for a quick thrill or an arcade enthusiast seeking a challenge, Bottomless Pitfall delivers engaging gameplay that’s easy to pick up but hard to master.

Move with your mouse or touch controls to steer clear of obstacles and rack up your best score in this mesmerizing, atmospheric experience.

Features:

- Simple Yet Addictive Gameplay: Move with your mouse or touch controls to avoid obstacles and keep the descent going. Easy to learn, hard to master!

- Arcade Action: Test your reflexes in a classic score-attack style.

- Quick Gameplay: Perfect for quick, immersive sessions.

Why You’ll Love It

Whether you’re a casual gamer seeking quick fun or an arcade fan chasing high scores, Bottomless Pitfall delivers an experience that keeps you coming back for “just one more try.” Its mesmerizing visuals, easy controls, and repeatable gameplay make it the perfect blend of relaxation and adrenaline-pumping action.

Are you ready to find out if there’s an end to the pit? Or will you join the ranks of those lost in the Bottomless Pitfall?

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 22.04.5 LTS (Jammy Jellyfish) or above
  • Processor: x86_64
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Pop!_OS 22.04 LTS
  • Processor: x86_64
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 Ti

name: Bottomless Pitfall

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or above
  • Processor: 64 bit
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or above
  • Processor: 64 bit
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 Ti

short_description: A fast-paced, single-player 3D arcade game where players navigate an endless descent by dodging obstacles, testing reflexes, and aiming for high scores.
